member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.DataVisualization.Network.Dijkstra.PQDijkstra.DijkstraFast
member.summary: Implements a generalized Dijkstra's algorithm to calculate both minimum distance and minimum path.
member.remarks: For this algorithm, all nodes should be provided, and handled in the delegate methods, including the start and finish nodes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.DataVisualization.Network.Dijkstra.PQDijkstra.DijkstraFast.InternodeTraversalCost
member.summary: Determines the cost of moving from a given node to another given node.
member.param: The node being moved away from.
The node that may be moved to.
member.returns: The cost of the transition from to , or if the transition is impossible (i.e. there is no edge between the two nodes).

member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: The total number of nodes in the graph.
The delegate that can provide the cost of a transition between any two nodes.
An optional delegate that can provide a small subset of nodes that a given node may be connected to.
